def modify_features(df_input) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    """
    import pandas as pd
    import numpy as np
    """
    Thought 1: The absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight can capture the imbalance in weight distribution.
    New Feature 1: weight_difference | weight_difference = abs(Left-Weight - Right-Weight)
    
    Thought 2: The relative distance of the weights and distances can provide insight into the tipping direction.
    New Feature 2: weight_distance_ratio | weight_distance_ratio = (Left-Weight / Left-Distance) / (Right-Weight / Right-Distance)
    
    Thought 3: The sum of the weights on both sides may give an indication of the total weight distribution.
    New Feature 3: total_weight = Left-Weight + Right-Weight
    
    Thought 4: The sum of the distances on both sides may be relevant in determining the tipping direction.
    New Feature 4: total_distance = Left-Distance + Right-Distance
    """
    df_output = df_input.copy()
    
    # Calculate absolute difference between Left-Weight and Right-Weight
    df_output['weight_difference'] = abs(df_output['Left-Weight'] - df_output['Right-Weight'])
    
    # Calculate the ratio of weight to distance on each side
    df_output['weight_distance_ratio'] = ((df_output['Left-Weight'] / df_output['Left-Distance']) / 
                                          (df_output['Right-Weight'] / df_output['Right-Distance']))
    
    # Calculate the total weight on both sides
    df_output['total_weight'] = df_output['Left-Weight'] + df_output['Right-Weight']
    
    # Calculate the total distance on both sides
    df_output['total_distance'] = df_output['Left-Distance'] + df_output['Right-Distance']
    
    return df_output
